content: > **subscribe to my newsletter and get an exclusive 50% off coupon code for your first purchase > subscribe here 2 ** **this pattern is part of the the diamonds bundle /patterns/sources/the-diamonds-bundle you can get this doily and matching paved diamonds rug at a discounted price** the pdf pattern provides an easy to follow crochet instructions - skill level - easy - the pattern is written using english u s terminology - suggested yarn type cotton fingering yarn - suggested hook d / 3mm you can use any yarn with a suitable hook size - doily dimensions using suggested hook 17 44 cm diameter if you have questions about the gauge size or yarn type please feel free to contact me with your questions ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- copyright © 2018 gootie designs agat rottman-cassel all rights reserved the pattern and photos in this pattern are property of gootie designs **you can sell the finished product on a small scale if you write about this product online please give credit to the original pattern ** please note that there is only a certain amount of variations possible when one crochets and any similarities to other patterns are purely coincidental to the best of my knowledge this pattern is my original unique design return/refund policy due to the fact that it is impossible to return a digital file all sales are final 2 https //madebygootie myflodesk com/ravelry-sign-up
